title: Cougar Simulator: Big Cats
description: Cougar Simulator: Big Cats is a simulation game that lets you step into the wild as a powerful cougar in a vast open-world adventure! Experience life as a big cat, hunting to feed yourself and your growing family, exploring beautiful landscapes, and upgrading your skills along the way. Customize your cougarâ€™s appearance, choosing from different skins and even adding unique features like a magical glow or leopard-like spots.
